title: tyler1 is my spirit animal
body:
rip tyler1 i will miss u bb

from ur pokemon brother mespryler

replies.body:
{{champion:119}} Tyler1 basically just said what 90% of lol players think, and for those of us in the oce server, we can probably agree that every match has at least one toxic af player on either team.

I'm still gonna watch his streams tho, he's fkn hilarious and tbh an appropriate representation of the majority of the people who play this game no matter how hard Riot denies this.
It's a shame to see such an entertaining streamer be perm banned. It almost seems like their's nobody entertaining left, except qt ofc.

Riot honestly thinks that they "have our backs when a genuine jerk comes along" yet they ban 2/3 best streamers on Twitch for their game. Forget us, they are harming themselves. It's not giving it a bad reputation, it's called free advertising.

And yes, I know Gore was banned by Twitch, but Krepo and Riot were the ones that complained to Twitch and got him banned.

There are stripper streamers that get naked on stream (that still do it, with no bans), yet Gross Gore and Tyler1 are hilarious and cool attitudes, and get banned indefinitely. 

The Tyler1 post has 3.6 thousand dislikes so far, and they aren't budging. Riot is becoming less and less of friendly game creators and more and more of a dictator. They do what they want, and if you don't like it, they won't listen to their fans and change things, they will just silence you.

It's happening. First URF, then arguably the best League streamers get banned. They cannot listen to people and I don't know how we are going to do it but we need Riot to understand that even giant bigget companies like Blizzard listen to their fans because they know it's free money. Plus Meteos is more toxic than Tyler these days, even on stream, yet he complains to Riot and Tyler gets banned.

So therefore...

#BanMeteos

> [{quoted}](name=Lurenza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hGeFvnpp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-01T14:17:26.728+0000)
>
> It's a shame to see such an entertaining streamer be perm banned. It almost seems like their's nobody entertaining left, except qt ofc.

luckily gross gore will start streaming again

won't be the same though
